item.title: Mod Proxy equivalent in IIS using ARR and URL Rewrite Module
item.description: IIS7 is quite modular, it is shipped with lots of goodies as separate modules and together it is now one of the most powerful and flexible web server. In this post I intent to cover how we can easily configure ARR and URL Rewrite Module to get a similar functionality as of Mod Proxy in Apache. Here I will demonstrate configuration of a reverse proxy which according to the definition is
